subject: Ryder Cup (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Sergio García seemed to be in total control Friday in leading Europe to a 5-3 lead over the United States in the 36th Ryder Cup, though he deflected some of the praise.
snippet: Sergio García seemed to be in total control Friday in leading Europe to a 5-3 lead over the United States in the 36th Ryder Cup, though he deflected some of the praise.
